li.title: Central Processing Unit (CPU)
li.p: Controls most of the activities of the computer, performs the arithmetic and logical operations, and contains a small amount of very fast memory.

li.title: Memory
li.p: Provides storage for the instructions for the CPU and the data they manipulate.

li.title: Input/Output (I/O)
li.p: Communicates with the outside world and with mass storage devices (e.g., disks).
